# Blockquotes

> This is a simple blockquote.

> This is a blockquote
> that spans multiple lines
> with continuous markers.

Multiple paragraphs in blockquote:

> First paragraph in quote.
>
> Second paragraph in quote.

Nested blockquotes:

> Outer quote
> > Nested quote
> > > Deeply nested quote
> > Back to nested
> Back to outer

Blockquote with other elements:

> ## Header in blockquote
>
> - List item 1
> - List item 2
